topic.title: Role Assignment - An Introduction
topic.shortdesc: Allows administrators to easily add/remove one or more users from a role.

body.p:
The "Role Assignment" module was built to allow administrators to easily add / remove one or more users from a role. This allows you to:
Select users who are not in a particular role (e.g. Admins) and then add one or more of those users to that role.
Select users who are in a particular role (e.g. Admins) and then remove one or more of those users from that role.
Select users who do not belong to any role (i.e Select "Users Not In Role" from the 1st dropdown menu and then "Not In Any Role" from the 3rd dropdown menu) and then assign them to a role.
Show user information either as their Name or Email Address to help with making a decision on what role that user or group of users belong to.
